dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.channel.SalesChannel
dataStructure.description:
A means by which a ServiceProvider makes available and sells ProductOfferings to the market. SalesChannels include DirectSalesForce, SalesAgents, TeleMarketers, and AlternateChannels.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SalesChannel

child.name: productOffering
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ProdOfferingProvidedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: productOffering

child.label: productCatalogSpecification
